description.author: Moritz Kiefer
description.description: Raw bindings to the OpenGL vector graphics library NanoVG

package-flags.name: gles3
package-flags.description: Build for GLES3. This deactivates GL3 support.

package-flags.name: gl2
package-flags.description: Build for GL2. This deactivates GL3 support.

package-flags.name: stb_truetype
package-flags.description: Use stb_truetype. By default uses freetype.
